1: <pb/><t>Chab'iraj taq chawunchelaal i hat</t> <t>i tikamanik taq pantaq chaq'ab' chupaam i rupaat i QaJaaw Dios.</t> <t>Chayeew taq ruloq'il i QaJaaw Dios.</t>
2: <t>Eh chajosaj taq aq'ab' chulooq'jiik i QaJaaw Dios,</t> <t>noq wilkaat taq parusantolaj ye'aab'.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Re' ta naq i QaJaaw Dios i xyej-anik reh i taxaaj, i wach ak'al</t> <t>neenkuxisanik taq weh chupaam i ye'aab' Si√≥n.</t>
